item.description:
Even though it has felt like we've skipped Autumn and moved right into Winter, there is still time for one more Cocktails and Conversations events before Halloween arrives!

We'll be meeting at the Alba Restaurant in Quincy on October 29th at 7pm. I've been receiving emails asking about the topic before the meeting, so I'm going to let the cat out of the bag! Here it is:

One of the elements of our relationships that we cannot escape is chemistry. Whether our relationship is with a significant other, a friend, or a coworker, chemistry is something we can not control, yet it feels incredibly important....or is it?

Let's have a drink and solve another one of life's mysteries! Can't wait to see you all there!
item.name: C&C in Quincy!
